restaient en groupe

translation.en: but I sat on my own.
And I remember that week trying to sit in with the group,
translation.fr:
Je me souviens d'avoir essayé
de m'intégrer à un groupe,

translation.en: and it was awful.
And I remember that week going, "I am not the same,"
translation.fr: Là, je me suis dit : "Je suis différente",

translation.en: and it wouldn't be for three and a half years later for me to get diagnosed.
translation.fr:
et ce n'est que trois ans et demi
plus tard, que j'ai été diagnostiquée.

translation.en: [Cian] How did you feel when you were diagnosed?
I was happy.
Having someone tell me that,
"No, this is what it is,
and there are thousands of other people like you,"
translation.fr:
"et il y a des milliers de gens
comme toi,"

translation.en: it made me feel human again.
translation.fr: je me suis sentie à nouveau humaine.

translation.en: I didn't feel completely outcast anymore.
translation.fr: Je ne me sentais plus complètement exclue.

translation.en: I still think it's probably one of the best days of my life.
translation.fr:
C'est, je crois,
l'un des plus beaux jours de ma vie.

translation.en: This is my games room.
A few years back, one of our concerts, we had a Kylie Minogue theme,
translation.fr:
Un de nos concerts
avait pour thème Kylie Minogue,

translation.en: and, uh, my sister wore this one.
translation.fr: et ma sœur a porté celui-ci.

translation.en: I'm planning to repurpose it into a new cosplay.
translation.fr:
Je compte le réutiliser
pour un nouveau cosplay.

translation.en: Um, I haven't decided exactly which character.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas encore décidé du personnage.

translation.en: So this is one of my, um, prop daggers.
translation.fr: Voici une de mes fausses dagues.

translation.en: I also have this one.
"Winter is coming."
It sits perfectly on me.
Cosplay is dressing up as your favorite characters
translation.fr:
Le cosplay, c'est se déguiser
en ses personnages préférés

translation.en: and bringing them to life.
It helps with going into social situations.
translation.fr: Ça aide dans les interactions sociales.

translation.en: I don't have to be me.
I can be another character,
translation.fr: Je peux être un autre personnage,

translation.en: and there's a lot less stress
on being those characters than being myself.
One of the biggest things I've had to learn is what people call masking,
translation.fr:
L'une des choses les plus difficiles
est le camouflage social,

translation.en: pretending and hiding the parts of me that don't fit neurotypical society.
translation.fr:
cacher des facettes de soi
inadaptées à une société neurotypique.

translation.en: In a perfect world,
no, I wouldn't have to learn how to word things
translation.fr:
je n'aurais pas à apprendre
à m'exprimer de façon

translation.en: so a neurotypical person doesn't find offense where there is none to be had,
translation.fr:
à ne pas offenser un neurotypique
involontairement,

translation.en: but we don't live in a perfect world.
translation.fr: mais on ne vit pas dans un monde parfait.

translation.en: -I missed you guys. -We missed you too!
So I'm thinking of starting dating again.
-[Kassandra] Yeah. -Awesome.
What kind of person would you like to meet?
translation.fr: Tu aimes quel genre de mec ?

translation.en: Um, someone that's kind of…
translation.fr: Tu aimes quel genre de mec ? Quelqu'un qui…

translation.en: kind of like us, but not 100% like us.
translation.fr:
est un peu comme nous,
mais pas à 100 %.

translation.en: -Yeah. -I think the same here.
Otherwise I probably would've dated one of you guys, and that would've been weird.
translation.fr:
Sinon, je serais sortie avec l'une de vous
et ça aurait été bizarre.

translation.en: But I guess definitely not clingy.
You remember the last time I dated someone who was clingy.
translation.fr: Vous vous souvenez de mon ex ?

translation.en: They wanted to, like, text me morning and night.
Like, "good morning and good night" every day.
[woman] You just want someone to encourage your dreams,
and you encourage theirs and push each other to your goals.
translation.fr:
Et que tu aideras
à atteindre ses objectifs.

translation.en: [Kassandra] That would be so good.
[chuckles] It's just difficult to find, especially as an autistic adult.
translation.fr:
C'est difficile à trouver,
surtout en tant qu'adulte autiste.

translation.en: Like, if you tell people that outright, half the time they'll judge you
translation.fr:
Si tu annonces que tu es autiste,
tu te fais juger,

translation.en: and think you've been keeping it secret.
translation.fr: et on imagine que tu l'as caché.

translation.en: I think someone who's gonna understand you.
translation.fr: Il faut quelqu'un qui te comprenne.

translation.en: -You need that. -Not-- not just a little bit of you.
translation.fr:
- Oui.
- Pas juste une facette de toi.

translation.en: -Like, the whole you. -Whole of you.
They'd also have to, like, fit in with you guys enough.
translation.fr: Il doit aussi s'entendre avec vous.

translation.en: They'll have to do, like, the nerd 101 test.
translation.fr: Il devra passer le test du geek de base.

translation.en: This is gonna be good.
Like, I've got my wing person.
I've got my buddies.
-I will do it. I will find someone. -We're your cheering squad. Whoo!
translation.fr:
- J'arriverai à trouver quelqu'un.
- On est avec toi.

translation.en: [Cian] When it comes to dating, what's your greatest fear?
translation.fr:
Que crains-tu le plus
en matière de rencards ?

translation.en: [exhales] Rejection.
There's nothing more terrifying to me on this earth
translation.fr: Il n'y a rien de plus terrifiant pour moi

translation.en: than a life doomed to loneliness.
translation.fr: qu'une vie vouée à la solitude.

translation.en: It's almost like feeling like an abandoned toy left in the closet
translation.fr:
C'est comme être un jouet abandonné
dans le placard

translation.en: while all the other toys are out being played with.
translation.fr: pendant qu'on joue avec les autres jouets.

translation.en: Much like how Woody was in Toy Story 4 when he was left in the closet.
translation.fr: Comme Woody dans Toy Story 4, quand il était dans le placard.

translation.en: That's exactly how I feel a lot.
translation.fr: C'est ce que je ressens souvent.

translation.en: [narrator] Tonight, Michael is attending a speed-dating event.
translation.fr:
Ce soir, Michael participe
à une soirée speed dating.

translation.en: -[host] Hello. -[Michael] Hello.
-[host] How are you? -Good. Yourself?
-Do you wanna take a seat? -[Michael] Thank you.
-Hello. How are you? -[Michael] Hello. Good. Yourself?
translation.fr:
- Salut. Ça va ?
- Bien, et toi ?

translation.en: Well, thank you.
-My name's Amelia. -I'm Michael.
-Nice to meet you. -Likewise.
-I like the outfit. -Thanks.
I like how the tie matches the handkerchief.
translation.fr: Avec la cravate assortie au mouchoir.

translation.en: -It's actually a pocket square. -Very nice.
What do you do in your spare time? What do you get up to?
Voice acting or watching television.
translation.fr: Imiter des voix ou regarder la télé.

translation.en: -What sort of voice acting? -There is one I've been trying lately.
translation.fr:
Quel genre de voix ? - Je fais une imitation en ce moment.
- C'est quoi ?

translation.en: -Love to hear it. -[imitates Scooby-Doo]
translation.fr:
- Je fais une imitation en ce moment.
- C'est quoi ?

translation.en: -Scooby-Dooby-Doo! -That's what I thought it was! [laughs]
And there's another character. It's called Muttley.
translation.fr: Je fais un autre personnage, Muttley.

translation.en: -That's really cool. -Yeah.
There's also, um, toy collecting, as well.
-Really? -Yeah.
-What, like vintage toys or--? -No. Thomas.
-The Tank Engine? -Yeah.
My little brother loves Thomas the Tank Engine.
translation.fr: Mon petit frère adore Thomas et ses amis.

translation.en: -How old is he, may I ask? -He is three years old.
translation.fr:
- Il a quel âge ?
- Il a trois ans.

translation.en: -Ah. -He's very fond of Thomas the Tank Engine.
-I mean, who isn't? -Yeah, that's true. That's true.
translation.fr:
- Tout le monde l'adore.
- C'est vrai.

translation.en: -I think everyone is pretty fond of him. -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Tout le monde l'aime bien.
- Oui.

translation.en: Do you have any hobbies that you like to do besides…
translation.fr: Et toi, tu as des hobbies ?

translation.en: Yeah, I go wakeboarding when I can get the chance.
-Wake-- wakeboarding? -It's like snowboarding, but on water.
translation.fr:
- Wakeboard ?
- Comme du snowboard, mais sur l'eau.

translation.en: -Oh. -Yeah, you get hooked on to a cable. And you get pulled around,
translation.fr:
On est accrochés à une corde
et on se fait tracter,

translation.en: and there's different tricks and whatnot that you can do. I've got my own board--
translation.fr:
on peut faire des tricks.
J'ai ma propre planche…

translation.en: -[clinking] -All right, everyone.
-It was really nice to meet you, Michael. -Likewise, Amelia. Take care.
translation.fr:
- Ce fut un plaisir, Michael.
- Pareil. À bientôt.

translation.en: -I'm Michael. -I'm Taylor.
-Nice to meet you, Taylor. -[chuckles] You too.
Your-- your top looks abs-- absolutely amazing.
Thank you. [chuckles]
-And so does your hair color. -Thank you.
translation.fr: La couleur de tes cheveux aussi.

translation.en: I got it from my grandmother, actually.
translation.fr: Je tiens ça de ma grand-mère.

translation.en: Do you mind if I ask what year you were born?
translation.fr:
Je peux demander
en quelle année tu es née ?

translation.en: Uh, 1996. Two years after me.
-[Taylor] Really? -Yeah.
Have you traveled a lot?
I've only been to Germany and Hawaii.
translation.fr:
Je ne suis allé qu'en Allemagne
et à Hawaï.

translation.en: How did you like it?
-I'm actually a Germanophile. -Yeah?
A Germanophile is somebody that loves German things.
translation.fr:
C'est quelqu'un
qui aime tout ce qui est allemand.

translation.en: Very nice.
I'm also a bit of an Anglophile.
-So you love English culture? -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Tu aimes la culture anglaise ?
- Oui.

translation.en: -What's your favorite? -Their cheeses.
translation.fr:
- Qu'est-ce que tu préfères ?
- Leurs fromages.

translation.en: And celebrities from there, as well.
Rosamund Pike, Jack Davenport.
-Alice Eve, Keira Knightley. -[laughs]
-John Cleese, Benedict Cumberbatch. -Yes.
All right, everyone move on to your next date.
All the men to the right.
I actually really enjoyed my time with you. [Taylor] Thank you. I did too.
translation.fr:
- J'ai apprécié parler avec toi.
- Moi aussi.

translation.en: -[woman] Hi. -Hello.
-[chuckles] I'm Tori. -I'm-- I'm Michael.
-Lovely to meet you. [chuckles] -Likewise.
So what do you do for a living?
translation.fr: Tu fais quoi dans la vie ?

translation.en: I am a mom.
Of a four-year-old girl named Brynne.
translation.fr:
d'une fille de quatre ans
qui s'appelle Brynne.

translation.en: -Ah. Nice. -Yeah.
-Are you a single mother? -I am a single mother.
How does-- how does that feel?
It feels good.
Good to be out of a relationship that didn't work.
translation.fr:
C'est bien de ne plus être
dans une relation qui ne marchait pas.

translation.en: -That's understandable. -[chuckles] Yeah.
Do you watch television much?
-No. -Oh.
[chuckles] I don't have a TV at home.
-[chuckles] -That sucks.
I think it's great.
Do you know much about astrology and star signs?
-No, not too much. -Oh.
-[chuckles] -[host] Everyone on to their next date.
translation.fr: On passe à la personne suivante.

translation.en: [Tori] See you. Lovely to meet you. -Likewise, Tori. Take care. -[chuckles]
translation.fr:
- À bientôt. Enchantée.
- De même, Tori. Au revoir.

translation.en: [narrator] Ronan has been volunteering for three years at Sydney Motorsport Park.
translation.fr:
Ronan fait du bénévolat depuis trois ans
au circuit automobile de Sydney.

translation.en: I know it's loud, but even so, it's, like, quite exciting.
translation.fr: C'est bruyant mais c'est vraiment génial.

translation.en: You hear the cars just, like, go zooming past.
translation.fr: Les voitures filent à toute vitesse.

translation.en: Like, you're on the edge of your seat
translation.fr: On a les yeux rivés sur la piste

translation.en: enjoying the wild ride.
translation.fr: et on profite de la course.

translation.en: Fifty. Yeah, I've got 50 there.
I check the drivers off in their correct position.
translation.fr:
Je vérifie que les pilotes
soient à la bonne place.

translation.en: It's like if-- if something isn't right, I-- I go over to the driver and ask.
translation.fr:
Si quelque chose cloche,
je vais parler au pilote.

translation.en: [driver] Nah, mate, this is my spot. This is my starting position.
translation.fr:
Non, c'est ma place.
C'est ma position de départ.

translation.en: -This is where I'm starting-- -[Ronan] Sorry, like, this is the law.
translation.fr:
- Je suis ici sur la grille.
- Désolé, c'est le règlement.

translation.en: -I cannot accept it. -[driver] I'm not moving.
translation.fr: Vous ne pouvez pas rester là.

translation.en: Corey! Corey!
-Come quick. -[Corey] Yeah.
What's the problem?
[Ronan] Car 351 is in the wrong position. [Corey] Well, that's where he's qualified to.
translation.fr:
- La voiture 351 est mal positionnée.
- C'est pas sa place.

translation.en: You gotta tell him. If he doesn't go now, we are gonna call race control. Simple as that.
translation.fr:
Explique-lui. S'il ne part pas,
on appelle le commissaire de course.

translation.en: -[Ronan] Yeah. -[Corey] All right?
[Ronan] Sorry, but if you don't move down, I'll have to call race control.
translation.fr:
Désolé, mais si vous ne bougez pas,
j'appelle le commissaire de course.

translation.en: [driver] Aww, jeez, man. All right.
[Corey] Well done. Well done.
I spoke to him respectfully and said,
translation.fr:
Je lui ai parlé avec respect
et j'ai dit :

translation.en: "I'm sorry, but this grid sheet is where you need to be."
translation.fr:
"Désolé, mais regardez,
voici votre position sur la grille."

translation.en: Like, really, I showed-- I showed bravery inside me.
I-- I just showed myself I was boss.
translation.fr: J'ai montré que c'était moi le boss.

translation.en: -Hello. [chuckles] -[Michael] Hello.
-I'm Jess. -I'm Michael.
-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you as well.
So do you go out much?
Um, spend time with friends whenever I get the chance,
translation.fr:
Je passe du temps
avec mes amis quand je peux,

translation.en: eating out or going to the cinemas.
translation.fr: on sort au resto ou au cinéma.

translation.en: -What kind of food do you like? -Italian or German.
translation.fr:
- Quel genre de cuisine aimes-tu ?
- Italienne ou allemande.

translation.en: German? Like schnitzels?
Schnitzels, bratwurst, kranskys.
I love food. [laughs]
Tell me about it.
I went on holiday a while back,
and I just ate my way through the whole holiday.
translation.fr: je n'ai pas arrêté de manger.

translation.en: There's so much amazing food outside of Australia.
translation.fr: Il y a tant de bons plats à l'étranger.

translation.en: -Where did you go? -I went to Europe.
Where in Europe?
I went to Germany, to England and a few other places. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
Je suis allée en Allemagne,
en Angleterre et ailleurs.

translation.en: Ah, I'd love to visit England.
It's cold. [laughs] It's really cold.
So I've heard, yeah.
Do you have any hobbies?
I like watching movies.
-Like what? -I like horror movies.
-Oh. -Yeah. [chuckles]
I also like to watch a lot of thrillers and, um, psychological movies, but…
translation.fr:
J'aime aussi regarder des thrillers
et des films psychologiques,

translation.en: -Creepy. -Yeah.
Lovely to talk to you.
-Nice to meet you too. -And meeting you as well.
-Enjoy the rest of your dates. -Thank you. Thanks.
translation.fr:
- Bon courage pour la suite.
- Merci.

translation.en: -Good luck with the other gentlemen. -You too. [chuckles]
Take care.
-Hello. -[woman] Hi.
-How are you? -I'm good. Yourself?
I'm--
I'm good. [chuckles]
That's good. I'm Michael.
-Nice to meet you. I'm Heather. -Nice to meet you, Heather.
Do you mind if I ask what year you were born?
One year after me.
You're 26?
Yep.
And, um…
Uh, try and think of a question.
[inhales] My mind's at a crossroads.
Um, what are your hobbies?
Watching television shows,
spiritual activities, like meditation, maybe yoga.
translation.fr:
faire des activités spirituelles :
méditation, yoga.

translation.en: I also wanna start learning how to do tai chi.
translation.fr: Je veux aussi apprendre le tai-chi.

translation.en: -Oh, cool. -Yeah.
What about you?
I like watching Netflix.
Um, have you been overseas before? Yeah, I went to England and Germany.
translation.fr:
- Tu as déjà été à l'étranger ?
- Oui, en Angleterre et en Allemagne.

translation.en: I've been to Germany twice. That's cool.
translation.fr:
- Je suis allé deux fois en Allemagne.
- Cool.

translation.en: -But I'd love to visit England. -It's a beautiful place, as well.
translation.fr:
- J'aimerais visiter l'Angleterre.
- C'est beau aussi.

translation.en: -Love their culture. -Yeah.
All the roast ch-- roast lamb and beef and-- yeah.
translation.fr: Et leurs rôtis d'agneau et de bœuf…

translation.en: It's amazing.
Yeah.
And I gotta say, you look absolutely amazing.
translation.fr: Je dois dire que tu es superbe.

translation.en: Thank you.
Your clothes, your glasses, your hairstyle.
translation.fr: Tes vêtements, tes lunettes, ta coiffure.

translation.en: Thank you.
You look amazing too.
Thank you. I love dressing like this anyway.
[chuckles] That's cool.
Do you watch television shows much?
I'm sad to admit that I watch The Bachelor.
-The Bachelor? -Yeah.
Never saw that.
The women out on there, they're horrible. Very nasty.
translation.fr:
Les femmes sont horribles.
Très méchantes.

translation.en: Yeah. So… hmm.
I should also tell you that I'm actually on the spectrum.
translation.fr: Je dois aussi te dire que j'ai un TSA.

translation.en: -Hmm. -The autism spectrum.
I'm on the spectrum too.
I know, like, all the stuff about Harry Potter… -Ah. -…Star Wars.
translation.fr: Je sais tout sur Harry Potter, Star Wars.

translation.en: So I get hooked onto things easily.
-Yeah, same. -Yeah.
[host] All right, that is it. We are done!
Thanks for your time, Heather.
-Thank you for your time too. -[Michael] No problem.
translation.fr:
- Merci à toi aussi.
- Pas de souci.

translation.en: -See you later. -Enjoy your night.
-[chuckles] Thank you. -Thanks. Good luck.
[narrator] At the end of the event, the singles choose who they'd like to see again.
translation.fr:
À la fin de la soirée, les célibataires
choisissent qui ils aimeraient revoir.

translation.en: They will only be matched if the other person also chooses them.
translation.fr:
Ils seront mis en contact
si l'autre personne les choisit aussi.

translation.en: I've ticked Taylor and Jessica.
I'm not gonna go for Tori.
And Amelia? Not really.
Heather, I've ticked her as well.
-[Cian] Are you happy with your decision? -Yep, definitely.
translation.fr:
- Tu es content de ta décision ?
- Oui. Carrément.

translation.en: Anna, here's the list.
The lucky list!
-Thank you so much for coming. -No problem.
-I'll give you a call tonight? -[Michael] Sure. Thank you.
translation.fr:
- Je t'appelle ce soir ?
- Oui. Merci.

translation.en: -Take care of yourself. See ya. -[Anna] You too, Michael. Bye-bye.
translation.fr:
- Bonne soirée.
- Toi aussi. Au revoir.

translation.en: [Cian] Do you have any rules for dating?
Pay full respect to a girl.
Make eye contact.
Make sure your body language is positive.
translation.fr:
S'assurer que mon langage corporel
est positif.

translation.en: Most importantly, enjoy your lovable activities together.
translation.fr:
Et surtout,
profiter ensemble des loisirs.

translation.en: I always want to do the right thing,
but really, like, one thing I do know,
I have heard about-- about Jodi, like, you know, Jodi, the dating coach?
translation.fr:
on m'a parlé de Jodi, la conseillère
en relations, tu la connais ?

translation.en: Like, yeah, she'll…
-She'll possibly teach me a lot. -[Cian] Yeah, if you wanna see her.
translation.fr:
- Elle pourrait beaucoup m'aider.
- Oui, tu peux la voir.

translation.en: -You think that would that be helpful? -Yeah, it would be helpful.
translation.fr:
- Ce serait utile ?
- Oui. Ce serait utile, car elle pourrait
me donner beaucoup de conseils.

translation.en: Because then I would be given a few-- lots of tips.
translation.fr:
Ce serait utile, car elle pourrait
me donner beaucoup de conseils.

translation.en: [narrator] Jodi Rodgers is a relationship specialist who works with autistic adults,
translation.fr:
Jodi Rodgers est conseillère en relations,
elle aide des adultes autistes,

translation.en: helping them in their search for love.
Hello, I'm Jodi.
-I'm Ronan. -Lovely to meet you.
-Is it okay if I come in? -[Ronan] Pleasure. Yeah. Definitely.
translation.fr:
- Je peux entrer ?
- Avec plaisir. Bien sûr.

translation.en: [Jodi] We're not born with social skills.
translation.fr:
On ne naît pas
avec des compétences sociales.

translation.en: We are taught social skills. We're taught greetings.
translation.fr:
On les acquiert.
On nous apprend à dire bonjour.

translation.en: We're taught how to have a back-and-forth conversation.
translation.fr: On nous apprend à faire la conversation.

translation.en: -Jodi, this is my mom. -Yes.
-My mom Linda. -Hi, Jodi. I'm Linda…
[Jodi] Some people have much more innate ability to pick up social skills quickly,
translation.fr:
Certaines personnes acquièrent rapidement
les compétences sociales,

translation.en: and for many autistic people, learning social skills is not easy.
translation.fr:
mais pour beaucoup d'autistes,
ce n'est pas chose facile.

translation.en: Here's your chair, Jodi.
[laughs] Thank you.
We also have to remember that autism is as diverse
translation.fr:
Il faut se rappeler
que l'autisme est aussi varié

translation.en: in people's need for support from others
translation.fr: dans ses besoins en matière de soutien

translation.en: as it is in its presentation itself.
translation.fr: que dans la forme qu'il revêt.

translation.en: So what things did you want help with today?
translation.fr: Alors, en quoi je peux t'aider ?

translation.en: 'Cause I hear that you might be going on your first date?
translation.fr: Il paraît que tu as un premier rencard ?

translation.en: -The first date, yeah. -[gasps]
So I've never been on a date before, but--
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais eu de rencard avant ça…

translation.en: but really, this is like something for me to achieve on,
translation.fr:
mais c'est vraiment quelque chose
d'important pour moi,

translation.en: like a relationship as boyfriend and girlfriend.
translation.fr:
la relation amoureuse
entre un garçon et une fille.

translation.en: So when you think about having a girlfriend,
what does that mean to you?
It means, like, I feel warm and comfortable.
translation.fr:
Ça veut dire se sentir bien,
être à l'aise.

translation.en: There's no any problems, that you're happy and calm.
translation.fr:
Ne pas avoir de problèmes,
être heureux et calme.

translation.en: Tell you what, I wish there was no problems.
translation.fr: J'aimerais qu'il n'y ait pas de problèmes.

translation.en: When you have a girlfriend, there's still problems.
translation.fr: Même en couple, les problèmes sont là.

translation.en: -Still problems? -Still problems.
-Having a girlfriend's a beautiful thing. -[Ronan] Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Avoir une copine, c'est super.
- Oui.

translation.en: But it doesn't make everything perfect.
translation.fr: Mais ça ne règle pas tout.

translation.en: You have to really try with another person.
translation.fr:
Il faut vraiment faire des efforts
avec l'autre.

translation.en: It's all about looking after one another, and all of that can be really, really hard work.
translation.fr:
Il faut s'occuper l'un de l'autre,
et ça peut être très dur.

translation.en: -Yeah. -But it's like driving the fastest car
translation.fr:
C'est comme conduire
la voiture la plus rapide

translation.en: on the hardest track.
translation.fr: sur le circuit le plus dur.
